concept.title: AFICC PGI 5307.104-92 Acquisition Strategy Panels (ASP) and Acquisition Plan (AP) Approval Authority

conbody.p: (a)(1) For large dollar or complex requirements it is recommended that the ASP convenes at least 18 months prior to the planned start of the contract or within a reasonable period of time that is commensurate with the complexity and value of the acquisition. An example of a typical timeline for large dollar and/or complex acquisitions is provided below.
•24 months or > – requirements identified and approved
•14 months – Source Selection Plan Approved (if required)
